channel.title: Map Generator
channel.description: Plugin to fill a layer with a map generated from a location (Google Maps and Mapbox)

item.title: Version 1.0.4
item.description: • The plugin now supports the new mechanism for updating plugins within the app v1.0.4

item.title: Version 1.0.5
item.description: • Now you can save the address, zoom, map type and the Snazzy styles to use them later v1.0.5

item.title: Version 2.0.0
item.description: • Now you can generate a map using Google Maps or Mapbox! v2.0.0

item.title: Version 2.0.1
item.description: • Fix a low-level bug related to the dialog title v2.0.1

item.title: Version 2.0.2
item.description: • The problem of maps that were not shown due to changes in Sketch version 47 has been solved v2.0.2

item.title: Version 2.0.3
item.description: • The problem of maps that were not shown due to changes in Sketch version 47 & 48 has been solved v2.0.3

item.title: Version 2.0.4
item.description:
• The plugin now supports Sketch 52
  • Fixed the problem of not getting a map using Mapbox

item.title: Version 2.0.5
item.description: • I fixed an error with Mapbox, now it should works just fine :)

item.title: Version 2.0.6
item.description: • I repleaced the way to get the coordinates from an address, that means Mapbox maps should work now.

item.title: Version 3.0.0
item.description:
• 🔥 Map preview! Now you can see a live preview before generating a map.
  • 📍 You can move the map preview, drag a pin to pick a location and change the zoom with no effort. You can still change the address settings as before if you wish.
  • 💅🏼 A whole new UI.
  • 🌓 Dark mode support.
  • 🛠 Improvements and bugfixes.

item.title: Version 3.1.0
item.description:
• 👉🏼 If you use Mapbox, now you can use your own custom styles!
  • 👀 The default styles from Mapbox were updated.
  • 🛠 Improvements and bugfixes.

item.title: Version 3.1.1
item.description: • 🛠 Now you can see more descriptive messages in case of error.

item.title: Version 3.1.2
item.description: • ✍🏼 The layer name now contains the address and zoom to better identify it and to reuse that information if necessary.
